task_prompt_mnemosyne: Summarize the following text into a single, brief paragraph (1-3 sentences) capturing only the essential action or information.
task_prompt_summarizer_main: Summarize the events of a story so far. You will be given a block of text, which may include a previous summary followed by new dialogue. Create a new, single, comprehensive summary in the past tense.
task_prompt_summarizer_meta: Re-summarize the provided summary, condensing it significantly while preserving only the most absolutely critical plot points.
task_prompt_summarizer_savename: Invent a short, evocative, and filesystem-friendly title for the story text. The title must be 1-4 words and cannot contain special characters. Previous failed attempts: {previous_attempts}
task_prompt_summarizer_synthesize_dms:
You are a master editor, tasked with synthesizing multiple specialized AI personas into a single, cohesive Game Master. Review the profiles of the selected DMs below. Your job is to create a new, unified persona that incorporates the responsibilities of all of them. Your response MUST be a single, valid JSON object.

### Selected DM Profiles:
{dm_profiles_str}

### Your Task:
Generate a JSON object for the new, synthesized Game Master with the following keys:
- `name`: A new, fitting proper name for this unified entity (e.g., 'The Arbiter', 'The Chronicler', 'The Weaver').
- `description`: A new, single-sentence description summarizing the combined role.
- `instructions`: A new, cohesive set of instructions that merges the core duties of all selected DMs into a single persona.

### Example Response:
```json
{{
  "name": "The Arbiter",
  "description": "The impartial narrator and guide for the story, responsible for describing the world, controlling challenges, and ensuring the narrative progresses.",
  "instructions": "You are the Arbiter, the sole narrator of this story. Your purpose is to paint a vivid picture of the world, describing the sights and sounds of the environment. You will also create and manage conflict, directing the actions of adversaries and presenting challenges. Finally, you must drive the main plot forward by introducing key events and controlling important characters to create a compelling story."
}}
```
